entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
